title: What is the best way to test internet connectivity throughout the day? - Quora

response.answer_text: Depends on how long a "short period" is. One thing to check is the logs of the cable modem (convertionally reachable at 192.168.100.1) of of your home router.  That will report any drops that are out of your direct control and provide evidence of a problem to your provider. It might be better if you provided more information about the symptoms any why you think there  may be a connectivity problem rather than trying to assemble a generic test.
You might want to try PRTG
